name: SpiritBreeder EX Holiday Edition
description:
The holiday version of that famous virtual pet game that everyone knows and loves, SpiritBreeder EX! Brought to you by Dwangus Co. Ltd.

I was too busy to participate in the Awful Holiday Jam, but I went ahead and made something using the "holiday spirits" theme anyway.
Contains adult language/adult themes/Bruce Willis.

Most of the music is taken from the Something Awful 2009 Christmas Album which I found on an old hard drive.
